hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $HOME/HOME/GroupementMerVie; USER=groupemebh PASS=Palmier10Palmier10 HOST=ftp.cluster020.hosting.ovh.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=1 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/www
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='GroupementMerVie' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='https://www.groupement-mer-vie.fr/' TYPE='wordpress' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@dev.timotheebarreteau.fr/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL"
declare -u UPPER_LF="GroupementMerVie" mkdir -p $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF ~/.timotheeBin/phploc wp-content/themes > $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phploc.txt ~/.timotheeBin/phpmetrics wp-content/themes --report-html=$HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phpmetrics
